item.title: About
item.description:
About the author

Undergraduate student majoring in software engineering,Kunming University of Science and Technology

IT practitioners

  • Java

2023.07-2024.8 zhihu(beijing) backend development golang,kubernetes,TiDB
2024.09-Until now baidu(beijing) バックエンド開発 golang,php,Search Technology

Contact information

mail

  • arturiamumu@gmail.com
  • 1743089727@qq.com
  • mlbwork@163.com

About the site

This site is the personal website of author himself

This website is mainly used to record some problems in the author’s study and work process

This website is built using Hugo+GitHub Pages

This website is based on the Hugo theme stack,published by Jimmy Cai

About the Hugo

Hugo is a static website generator written in Go language,using the Apache 2.0 open source license

Hugo supports configuration files in three formats:TOML/YAML/JSON

Hugo supports pages in Markdown and HTML formats,and also supports the use of shorts codes to enrich page content

Hugo natively supports multi-language,page classification,image processing,etc.

Hugo generates websites very fast and can be quickly deployed to private servers,commercial servers,GitHub Pages,Netlify,etc.

Official homepage gohugo.io

GitHub homepage https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo

About the hugo-theme-stack

Developed by Jimmy Cai

The GitHub homepage of the hugo-theme-stack project https://github.com/CaiJimmy/hugo-theme-stack

Follow the open source agreement GPL v3.0

Theme example https://demo.stack.jimmycai.com/

Key features include:

  • dark mode
  • site search
  • automatic filing
  • image lightbox
  • tag cloud

item.title: Blog bug log
item.description:
bug log

2023-06-20 16:30:34

bug description

The blog comment function is unavailable,specifically:

  • At the end of the comment at the end of the blog,the words “No related Issues were found to comment,please contact xxx to initialize creation”
  • Click “login with GitHub” to jump back this blog,no other response

Trace the source

Google found that the blog uri may be too long.After investigation,it was not caused by this problem.

After observation,it was found that when the page was redirected,the URL in the address bar was followed by the wrong parameter “error=redirect_urixxx”,witch is presumed to be a GitHub callback error.

After investigation,it was found that the blog.mulinbiao.com domain name was bound before,and the callback configured by GitHub OAuth was not updated.

Bug fix

Open GitHub settings -> developer settings -> OAuth Apps,change the Homepage URL and Authorization callback URL to https://blog.mulinbiao.com/

item.title: Blog description
item.description:
Prelude

I wanted to start my own blog a long time age,bug I was always busy(lazy). Taking advantage of the gap between graduation,I finally decided to take the time to start realizing it. The main purpose of starting this blog is as follows:

record life and thoughts

Writing a blog can record one’s experience,feelings,thinking and opinions in the form of words, witch can not only help oneself better understand one’s thinking and sum up experience, but also share one’s own mental journey with others.

Communicate and learn

A blog is also a platform for communication and learning.You can communicate and share your experiences and insights with other bloggers,readers and peers, to gain more inspiration and learning opportunities.

About this blog

This blog is built using Hugo+Github Pages,please refer to 如何用 GitHub Pages + Hugo 搭建个人博客 and 个人博客记 —— Github pages 绑定个人域名 . In addition,for the purpose of learn foreign languages,I will try my best to publish the Chinese,English and Japanese versions of the blog at the same time. If you find any language or content errors,you are welcome to criticize correct.

This blog uses the second-level domain name blog.mulinbiao.com to resolve to arturiamu.github.io. Since the domain name blog.mulinbiao.com involves issues such as renewal and filing,the connectivity be guaranteed. It is recommended to use arturiamu.github.io for access.

Agreement

Unless otherwise stated,all articles on this site use the CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 Creative Commons Licence

No additional restrictions — You may not apply legal terms or technological measures that legally restrict others from doing anything the license permits.

Notices:

You do not have to comply with the license for elements of the material in the public domain or where your use is permitted an applicable exception or limitation.

No warranties are given.The license may not give you all the permissions necessary for your intended use. For example,other rights such as publicity,privacy,or moral rights may limit how you use the material.
